Key: Oh, Kotori? What are you doing here?
You're such a pervert! You idiot! PERV!

Hey, wait! What do you mean? Don't tell me you
remember what just happened.

So you did see it! Forget it! Forget that you ever
saw it!
Guohh... That's not a reason for you to kick me!
B-Beats me... I don't get it, either.
I'm going home! Aghhhhh! I hate you!
